summary: This document appears to be an email or message thread from February 2007, showing communication between an individual and Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant. The assistant relays a message from Epstein stating he is awaiting a picture, and asks why the recipient wanted to hear from them before bed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned by his executive assistant as awaiting a picture from the recipient of the message.

events.title: Email exchange regarding picture
events.description: An email exchange where Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant relays that Epstein is awaiting a picture from the recipient and inquires about their desire to communicate before bed.

keyFacts: The document is an email or message thread dated February 15, 2007.
Jeffrey Epstein's executive assistant is communicating on his behalf, indicating he is awaiting a picture from the recipient.
The tone of the message is casual and personal, asking why the recipient wanted to hear from them before going to bed.
